sen.j: 宮ヶ浜水泳場（みやがはますいえいじょう）は、滋賀県近江八幡市にある水泳場。
sen.e: Miyagahama Swimming Area is a swimming area located in Omihachiman City, Shiga Prefecture.
Miyagahama Swimming Area is a swimming area located in Omihachiman City, Shiga Prefecture.
Miyagahama Swimming Area is a swimming area located in Omihachiman City, Shiga Prefecture.

sen.j: 海であれば「海岸」・「海水浴場」であるが、琵琶湖であるので「水泳場」。
sen.e: If there is sea, it should be called "seashore" and "swimming beach", but, as it is Lake Biwa, it is called "swimming area".
If there is sea, it should be called 'seashore' and 'swimming beach,' but, as it is Lake Biwa, it is called 'swimming area.'
If there is sea, it should be called 'seashore' and 'swimming beach,' but, as it is Lake Biwa, it is called 'swimming area.'

sen.j: 1977年～1979年にかけて鳥人間コンテスト選手権大会（読売テレビ）の会場となった。
sen.e: In the period of 1977 through 1979, it was used as the site for Japan International Birdman Rally (Yomiuri Telecasting Corporation).
In the period of 1977 through 1979, it was used as the site for Japan International Birdman Rally (Yomiuri Telecasting Corporation).
sen.cmt: スペース調整しました。
sen.e: In the period of 1977 through 1979, it was used as the site for Japan International Birdman Rally (Yomiuri Telecasting Corporation).

sen.j: 日本の水泳場88選に選ばれている、長さ約400mのビーチ。
sen.e: It is a beach with the length of 400 meters approx. and selected as one of 88 best swimming areas in Japan.
It is a beach with the length of 400 meters approx. and selected as one of 88 best swimming areas in Japan.
It is a beach with the length of 400 meters approx. and selected as one of 88 best swimming areas in Japan.

sen.j: 売店、カフェテリアなどを完備する。
sen.e: It is fully provided with stands and cafeterias.
It is fully provided with stands and cafeterias.
It is fully provided with stands and cafeterias.

sen.j: 子ども向けのプール、林間のキャンプ場、宿泊施設もある。
sen.e: There are also a pool for children, campsite in the forest and an accommodation facility.
There are also a pool for children, campsite in the forest and an accommodation facility.
There are also a pool for children, campsite in the forest and an accommodation facility.
